title: Output
description:
At this level you must get input and put it to the main string.
All chars are free exept of digits.
Tip: press info button on the top bar
[[b;yellow;]123 => 123]

title: Increment
description:
You get a binary number (consisting of 0s and/or 1s) and you must return (set the mainstring to) the same number, increased by 1 (also binary)
[[b;yellow;]101 => 110
11=>100]

title: Loop
description:
You get a binary number and you must return a string, consisting of amount of 'x', equal to the passed number
[[b;yellow;]100 => xxxx
10010 => xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
0 => ]

title: Sum
description:
Return a sum of two passed binary numbers. Output must be without 0s at the begining.
Both numbers are the same length!
Note: read the first number and then read the second one (not together).
[[b;yellow;]1, 1 => 10
010, 100 => 110
010, 001 => 11]
